basics.summary: Nathan Acks has over 20 years of experience in a wide variety of IT disciplines, including systems administration, website design, database administration, vendor and project management, and application development. In 2016 they helped found the IT & Security Team at the Public Interest Network (TPIN), and as its first director oversaw the push to modernize TPIN's IT infrastructure and improve its IT security programs. Nathan is now looking to return to a more hands-on role and build on their IT security experience by beginning a new career in cybersecurity.
